name: contest-pass
effect: Allows the trainer to enter Contests.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A pass required for entering Pokémon Contests. It has a drawing of an award ribbon on its front.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A pass required for entering Pokémon Contests. It has a drawing of an award ribbon on its front.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A pass required for entering Pokémon Contests. It has a drawing of an award ribbon on its front.
